## setValueByPath() function

 使用字符串点操作获设置对象中属性, 中间不存在的属性值将被设为 {<!-- -->}

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function setValueByPath(obj: any, path: string, value: any): any;
```

**Returns:**

any

## Example

setValueByPath(obj, 'a.b.c', 'value')
